title: Can someone explain this to me?
body:
So I recently had a friend that wanted to play ranked after seeing me playing ranked. He played all of his placements games (never played ranked before and been playing league for 8months) and he got silver 4. He won 4 and lost 6 and let’s just say did not go particularly well. So the reason I’m asking this question is that in S7 I got placed in B1 won 6 and lost 4 and played a lot better than he did. So why is it that he got S4? And I got B1? Even though these are seasons apart I belive nothing has changed on how the placements system work therefore asking this question. Kinda fed up how unexperiennced players (look at his match history) get something like silver compared to someone like me who has to spend an extra month to climb to silver from B4. Really pisses me off tbh considering he literally got carried and all I’ve been aiming for is S5 and then he gets it without any effort at all.

Note: sorry for rambling or if this does lot make much sense it’s late and just wanted to ask this question so I can get answers when I wake up. O and here is his op.gg

replies.body: Cause he won his first games of his provisionals so his mmr was up at the start of that ... likely you lost your first games of your promos

LMAO, on one of my accounts i went 0/10 in provis, and got placed silver 1, with no previous MMR, maybe you're just bad and your friend is better.

My friend went 5/5 in her provis, and ended up silver 3, with silver 2 MMR, with worse stats than me, in pretty much all games (excluding the one where i literally inted, because heal/ghost jg...)

What you get in provis is not the singular impact on your MMR, KDA, Objective Control, Warding (all the other stats you seen in graphs at post game) all impact it, maybe you need to improve in those areas,

if you're playing tanks, self-mitigated, with high dmg taken and low deaths will improve the MMR (a little bit)
If you're adc, good kda, decent objective control, high cs
If you're support (Tank ~ see above ~), mage/utility, high Crowd control/warding scores
If you're mid, same as adc

Can't help with jg, because fuck that role, but i assume high kill participation, baron/drag control would do something

Provis is but one factor (the largest, but no the only) your score counts too, if he has better scores than you, he's gonna get placed higher

TBH, I donâ€™t think I am bad. I am just impatient at the fact it takes days and weeks to get to my desired rank. Although I am frustrated on how my friend got this rank when I think he did not deserve it at all. And also if I was to get to silver in my placements what champion would you recommend be the easiest. Tanks?

rammus (fucking amazing in low elo, especially in games when the enemy team goes full ad, is a free win), 
garen (be surprised, this guy is one of the best toplaners in the meta for gold and below), 
skarner (do you dislike getting 1v5'd by that smurf? if yes, well skarner's ya boy, point and click supression, a beautiful unfair relic of bygone seasons), 
nunu (do you want to be useful regardless of if you're 10-0 or 0-10? well that's nunu... and also singed, but it's alot harder to play singed),
vi (see skarner, fuck counterplay),
soraka (this isn't so much carry, so much as passively offer quite alot of healing and sort of climb through net averages), 
malphite (play this guy top, don't play this guy jungle because in low elo snowball fest, you need to be able to repeat gank a tilted yasou, learn how to freeze and push lane, there aren't mechanics to learn, roam with ult, sit under tower, group, get a 5man knockup, win, profit?)
ahri (don't make big plays, just farm till 6, do a quick waveclear, go botlane, get a dbl kill, return to lane and farm under tower, wait till ult is up again, get a gank from jungle, ect.. don't make big plays, you need to remain calm with ahri and not get greedy),
zilean (bomb waves, bomb waves, piss off the enemy laner with the fact that you aren't fighting, you're just bombing waves, roam, piss off assassins with your ult, piss off assassins with your stopwatch, piss off assassins with your zhonias, a slow, a stun and then your ult, just make sure you don't get out of position).

Tanks
Braum, Thresh (personal favourite), Leo, Cho, Dankrius, Malph, Poppy, to give you a few options

Nasus if you just want to afk all game, then win anyways
